descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Survivorman VR: The Descent is a gripping reality-based immersive 3-hour survival challenge featuring legendary survival expert Les Stroud as your guide. Survive an Arctic adventure as the sole survivor of a helicopter crash on a freezing mountain. Lost, cold, and with darkness closing in, can you build a fire and shelter to brave the elements?

Face real-world extreme challenges that push your intellect, emotions, and physical abilities to the limit. Under the expert guidance of Les Stroud, rely on your skills and resourcefulness to make it down the mountain without dying.

PROGRESSION
Over seven intense levels, confront challenges that test your survival skills and inch you closer to rescue. From crafting snowshoes to glissading down a slope, navigating glacial crevasses, building a hunting trap, rappelling down a cliff, and keeping the fire burning - every move counts.

Follow the river to potential rescue, but not without a nerve-wracking encounter with a hungry, disturbed polar bear.

AUTHENTIC SURVIVAL
Survivorman VR is an adventure grounded in real, tried-and-true survival techniques and scenarios, delivered by world-renowned survival expert Les Stroud. With over 30 years of wilderness survival experience, Stroud shares his wealth of knowledge. While he guides your expedition, the decisions you make will determine whether you live or die. It's the ultimate test of your survival instincts.

Join our Discord to be updated: https://discord.com/invite/4TcqKmQs7V
